thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 2 of 10
thread.title: Kim

author: Kim
title: Kim
text: I was initially concerned travelling on my own with a group, but the people on the tour were all amazing. There was a mix of solo and couples with a majority of people being in their 30's. The whole tour was very well organised and our guide was incredibly friendly with so much local knowledge. I enjoyed all of the activities I participated in. Climbing Mt Kinabalu was certainly the highlight. It was challenging, but the guides were encouraging and never left the side of the people that struggled. It was a great mix of adventure with some relaxing beach time on Turtle Island. I was already planning my next Intrepid adventure before I came home!
